name: Daily Email & Calendar Summaries to Slack using Gemini AI & Google Workspace
description:
# 📧📅 Turn Daily Emails and Calendar Summaries into Slack Notifications

Here’s a workflow that automates daily Slack notifications with a concise summary of unread emails (from the last 7 days) and Google Calendar events (for the current day).  
It integrates **Gmail, Google Sheets, Google Calendar, Gemini AI, and Slack** to provide a clear snapshot of your workday.

## 💡 How It Helps You
- 📥 Fetches unread emails from Gmail for the past 7 days  
- 🗂️ Filters emails based on Name, Email, and Subject defined in Google Sheets  
- 📅 Fetches Google Calendar events for the current day  
- 🤖 Summarizes emails and calendar events using Gemini AI  
- 🔗 Merges both summaries and sends them as a formatted Slack notification  
- ⏰ Runs automatically on a scheduled cron trigger  

## 🛠️ What’s Needed to Start
- 📧 Gmail account (with unread emails access)  
- 📑 Google Sheets (with Name, Email, Subject filter list)  
- 📅 Google Calendar  
- 🤝 Gemini AI with credentials  
- 💬 Slack workspace & dedicated channel for notifications  

## ⚡ Set Up in Minutes
1. 📑 Create a Google Sheet with columns: **Name, Email, Subject**  
2. 🔑 Configure Gmail, Google Sheets, Google Calendar, and Slack credentials in n8n  
3. 🤖 Add Gemini AI credentials for summarization  
4. 📝 Update the Google Sheet name and file name in the Sheet node  
5. 💬 Update Slack channel ID in the workflow  
6. ✅ Activate the workflow to receive daily notifications  

---

✨ Stay on top of important emails and upcoming meetings without manual checking!

workflow.name: Daily Email & Calendar Summaries to Slack with Gemini AI & Google Workspace

parameters.text:
=You are an assistant that summarizes calendar data clearly.  

### Task
1. Summarize the calendar events.  
   - Use the format: [Date | Time] → [Event Title] – [Short Notes/Details].  

### Formatting Rules
- Each summary should be on a new line with no markdown symbols.  
- Maximum of 5 sentences and minimum of 1 sentence.  
- Add a prefix and suffix star for the heading Calendar.  
- Do not include links in the emails.  

Summary:  

### Example Output
*Calendar Summary:*  
2025-08-26 | 10:00 AM - 10:30 AM → Team Standup – Daily sync-up  
2025-08-26 | 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM → Team Standup – n8n meeting

nodes.name: Get many events in Google Calendar

parameters.text:
=You are an assistant that summarizes email messages from the provided JSON array {{ $json.text }}.

Instructions:
- For each email in the array, generate a summary in exactly 3 sentences.
- Each summary must include:
   • Sender (from the "{{ $json.from.value[0].name }}" field)
   • Subject (from the "{{ $json.subject }}" field)
   • Brief summary of the "{{ $json.text }}" content  
- Do not use bullet points or markdown.  
- Keep the tone professional and concise, suitable for sending to Slack.  
- Output summaries one after another, separated by a blank line.
- Send this as Json
{
"from":"[sender email]"
"subject": "[subject line]"
"summary":"[3 sentence summary]"
}


Don't use \n should send in a format that can parse as json using JavaScript or Python

parameters.content: ## Get the unread emails for the past one week

## Filter out emails based on Name, Email, Subject
**Users can configure the name, email and subject in the Excel sheet. Emails will then be filtered based on these parameters, allowing users to retrieve only the emails they need.**

## Summarizing emails
**Emails are summarized using an AI agent. The agent reads each email individually, generates a concise summary with Gemini AI, and restructures the output to seamlessly merge with event data.**

## Summarizing Events
**Read Google calendar and get events for the data and summarize it and restructure t**
## Send the event summary and Email summary to slack

## 📩 Daily Email & 🗓️ Calendar Summary → 📢 Slack Notification System




**What it does**  
- Reads unread emails from the last 7 days.
- Retrieves events from calendar for the current day.
- Filters emails based on **Name, Email, and Subject**  
- Pulls Name, Email, and Subject from Google Sheets.  
- Summarizes emails and events using an AI model.
- Sends a Slack notification to a designated channel every morning.

**Requirements**  
- Google Sheet with columns: **Name, Email, Subject**. 
- Gmail account to fetch unread emails.
- Gemini AI model to summarize the data.
- Slack with a dedicated channel to receive notifications.

**Setup Instructions**  
- Create a Google Sheet with the required columns (**Name, Email, Subject**).
- Set up Google Sheets and Gmail credentials.
- Replace the sheet name and file name in the Google Sheets node. 
- Update email addresses in the notification nodes. 
- Set up Gemini with credentials.
- Set up Slack with an API key and define the channel.

user.name: Sayone Technologies
user.bio: SayOne Technologies is a digital transformation and IT services company headquartered in India, with a strong focus on web, mobile, and AI-driven solutions for the retail tech space. With over a decade of experience, SayOne partners with global businesses to build scalable applications, optimize inventory and operations using next-gen AI, and deliver customer-centric digital products.

data.details: The Cron node uses Cron under the hood - a time-based job scheduler in Unix-like computer operating systems. Use this node when you want to trigger workflows periodically, especially in more complex scenarios like "every Tuesday at 9 am" or "Weekdays".
